title: The Mistletoe Kiss
description: Emmy was plain and mousey â€“ why would Ruerd look her way? Ermentrude Foster helped the family finances by working at St Luke's Hospital. While she often spoke her mind to Professor Ruerd ter Mennolt, who was sometimes impatient, he did offer practical aid with Emmy's difficulties. Ruerd couldn't understand why, with a beautiful fiancee in Anneliese, he troubled with Emmy, but he still invited her to his home in Holland for Christmas...
author: Betty Neels
